description: Whole Foods, the wildly popular grocery, is planning another store in DeKalb County on Peachtree Boulevard.
title: Here comes another new DeKalb Whole Foods
title_page: New Whole Foods market coming to DeKalb County
text:
One more, DeKalb.
On top of plans in the Decatur area, Whole Foods, the wildly popular grocery, is planning another store in the county. This one will be on Peachtree Boulevard in Chamblee, next to a variety of other businesses, including Cook’s Warehouse.
The development, dubbed Peachtree Station, is expected to open in summer, according to the builders, S.J. Collins Enterprises.
Whole Foods is the “anchor” of the development located at 5001 Peachtree Boulevard.
